title: [aerospace] High Employee Turnover Risk in Operations
description: The Operations department has the highest number of employees (14), but the average salary grade is G06, which may indicate lower job satisfaction or competitiveness in pay. This could lead to high turnover rates.
business_impact: High turnover can lead to increased training costs and operational disruptions.

title: [aerospace] Potential Over-reliance on Specific Airlines
description: The dataset shows a concentration of maintenance activities for specific airlines, such as KE and OZ, which could pose risks if these airlines face operational issues.
business_impact: Over-reliance on a few airlines can lead to vulnerabilities in service continuity.

title: [aerospace] Employee Badge Access Level Concerns
description: A significant number of employees (25) have LEVEL2 badge access, which may not be sufficient for their roles, especially in operations and maintenance. This could lead to security risks.
recommendations: Review and upgrade badge access levels based on job roles
business_impact: Inadequate access levels can compromise security and operational integrity.
